Title: Teleport Access List owners can escalate their privileges
Description:
### Impact
Access Lists are a new feature introduced in Teleport 14 and currently under preview. An issue was discovered that allows an Access List Owner to assign arbitrary permissions, including permissions to themselves which could result in privilege escalation.

### Patches
Fixed in version 14.2.4 and 13.4.13
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 13.0.0 before 13.4.13, all versions starting from 14.0.0 before 14.2.4
NotImpacted: All versions before 13.0.0, all versions starting from 13.4.13 before 14.0.0, all versions starting from 14.2.4
